languages.text: "Руины создают слабый пси-фон... впрочем, сейчас он не представляет непосредственной угрозы. Задерживаться все же не советую".
"The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."
languages.original_text: "Руины создают слабый пси-фон... впрочем, сейчас он не представляет непосредственной угрозы. Задерживаться все же не советую".

traits.locale_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."
"The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."
"The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."
"The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

languages.text: “这些废墟散发着微弱的灵能能量……不过，这些能量目前并不会构成直接威胁。但即便如此，我仍然建议不要在这里逗留。”
languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

traits.locale_text: “这些废墟散发着微弱的灵能能量……不过，这些能量目前并不会构成直接威胁。但即便如此，我仍然建议不要在这里逗留。”

languages.text: «Las ruinas emiten energías psíquicas débiles... aunque no suponen una amenaza directa por ahora. No obstante, no recomiendo pasar más tiempo del necesario aquí».
languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

traits.locale_text: «Las ruinas emiten energías psíquicas débiles... aunque no suponen una amenaza directa por ahora. No obstante, no recomiendo pasar más tiempo del necesario aquí».

languages.text: 「この遺跡はかすかな精神エネルギーを発している…だが、今は直接的な脅威にはなっていない。だが、長居はすべきではないな」
languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

traits.locale_text: 「この遺跡はかすかな精神エネルギーを発している…だが、今は直接的な脅威にはなっていない。だが、長居はすべきではないな」

languages.text: "Von den Ruinen gehen schwache psionische Energien aus ... Allerdings geht fürs Erste keine direkte Gefahr von ihnen aus. Trotzdem sollten wir hier nicht verweilen."
languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

traits.locale_text: "Von den Ruinen gehen schwache psionische Energien aus ... Allerdings geht fürs Erste keine direkte Gefahr von ihnen aus. Trotzdem sollten wir hier nicht verweilen."

languages.text: « Les ruines émettent une faible énergie psy... mais la menace n'est pas immédiate. Cela dit, je serais d'avis de ne pas trop nous attarder ici. »
languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

traits.locale_text: « Les ruines émettent une faible énergie psy... mais la menace n'est pas immédiate. Cela dit, je serais d'avis de ne pas trop nous attarder ici. »

languages.text: "Harabelerden çok hafif ruh enerjileri yayılıyor ancak şimdilik direkt olarak bir tehdit teşkil etmiyorlar. Yine de burada uzun süre oyalanmamayı öneririm."
languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."

traits.locale_text: "Harabelerden çok hafif ruh enerjileri yayılıyor ancak şimdilik direkt olarak bir tehdit teşkil etmiyorlar. Yine de burada uzun süre oyalanmamayı öneririm."

languages.original_text: "The ruins are emitting faint psy energies... However, it does not pose a direct threat for now. But I advise that we do not linger here."
